value.title: Researchers investigate ethical side of AI impacts on meaningful work
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence threatens to dramatically change the work we do and how our workplaces operate. Macquarie University researchers examine some vital ethical questions raised by this new technology.

value.title: Top 6 AI Trends 2023
value.excerpt: AI trends include the growth of generative AI, the democratization of AI and greater focus on ethics and compliance.

value.title: How to avoid pitfalls and navigate the ethical landscape of generative AI
value.excerpt: We still have a lot to figure out. That was my impression of a Transform 2023 panel that drilled into the ethics of generative AI.

value.title: 3 Strategies For Accountable AI Usage In B2B Sales
value.excerpt: Sales leaders codify business ethics to guide employees in their daily actions with these three principles of accountable AI usage.

value.title: How Future Histories Of ‘Other Intelligences’ Clarify Today’s AI
value.excerpt: In 'The Institute for Other Intelligences,' Mashinka Firunts Hakopian combines speculative fiction and media theory to propose equitable futures for intelligent life.

value.title: Announcing the nominees for VentureBeat’s 5th Annual Women in AI awards
value.excerpt: VentureBeat announces the nominees for the 5th annual Women in AI Awards. The winners will be announced at VentureBeat Transform on July 12.

value.title: AI nursing ethics: Viability of robots and artificial intelligence in nursing practice
value.excerpt: Robots and artificial intelligence (AI) are expected to play a key role in nursing practice in the future. In this regard, researchers from Japan ask whether intelligent machines can replace humans as nurses.

value.title: Are We Going Too Far By Allowing Generative AI To Control Robots, Worriedly Asks AI Ethics And AI Law
value.excerpt: Generative AI such as ChatGPT is increasingly being used to control robots. This bodes for concern since the AI might produce faulty instructions and endanger humans.

value.title: Shaping A Responsible AI-Powered Future In Life Science
value.excerpt: Our ethical commitment to harnessing AI's potential responsibly will be instrumental in realizing its promise of a healthier, more equitable future for all.

value.title: These are the 3 biggest fears about AI — and here's how worried you should be about them

value.title: Pope Francis launches a guide to using artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: There are more and more voices that are warning about the use and consequences of artificial intelligence. They are often the voices of tech entrepreneurs like Elon Musk or the experts involved in their development.

value.title: UN AI for Good Summit Explores How Generative AI Poses Risks and Fosters Connections
value.excerpt: Panelists at the UN AI for Good summit discussed regulation, international cooperation, and the growth of generative AI.

value.title: AI Ethics In The Age Of ChatGPT - What Businesses Need To Know
value.excerpt: Photo: Arne Dedert/dpa (Photo by Arne Dedert/picture alliance via Getty Images) AI Ethics was a complicated topic even before ChatGPT (and other Large Language Models - LLMs) and Generative AI burst onto the scene. In this article - we cover how LLMs and ...

value.title: Generative AI’s secret sauce — data scraping— comes under attack
value.excerpt: Data scraping of the internet for massive amounts of data could be described as generative AI's secret sauce. Experts say the current blowback is unsurprising.

value.title: Responsible AI: A Mandate In Finance And Insurance
value.excerpt: Companies that deploy AI responsibly can stand out from competitors while avoiding legal problems and other mistakes that can erode customer trust and damage reputations.

value.title: AI Is an Existential Threat – Just Not the Way You Think
value.excerpt: From open letters to congressional testimony, some AI leaders have stoked fears that the technology is a direct threat to humanity. The reality is less dramatic but perhaps more insidious.

value.title: Pope Francis Takes a Stand on AI: Vatican Releases AI Ethics Handbook
value.excerpt: The Vatican has delved into artificial intelligence (AI) ethics by releasing an extensive handbook. The Pope Francis-founded Institute for Technology, Ethics, and Culture (ITEC) and the Markkula ...

value.title: AI gold rush makes basic data security hygiene critical
value.excerpt: The obsession with all-things generative AI signals a need for business leaders to rethink their security approaches.

value.title: Debunking AI Myths: The Truth Behind 5 Common Misconceptions
value.excerpt: Unravel the enigma of AI as this article busts five pervasive myths, from fears of robotic world domination to the mistaken belief in machines' unbiased judgment.

value.title: Teaching Kids The Ethics Of Artificial Intelligence

value.title: AI and ethics: Building trustworthy and transparent artificial intelligence systems
value.excerpt: As AI technologies become increasingly sophisticated and pervasive, it is crucial to address the ethical considerations associated with their development and deployment. This article delves into the importance of ethics in AI and focuses on the imperative ...

value.title: The Vatican Releases Its Own AI Ethics Handbook
value.excerpt: The Vatican is getting in on the AI craze. The Holy See has released a handbook on the ethics of artificial intelligence as defined by the Pope. The guidelines are the result of a partnership between Francis and Santa Clara University’s Markkula Center ...

value.title: NY bills would ban 'deepfakes,' put guardrails on artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: Measures passed by the State Legislature this session include banning "deepfake" images online that most often are used to humiliate or coerce women.

value.title: Why business leaders must tackle ethical considerations as AI becomes ubiquitous
value.excerpt: Technology will only continue to evolve, so it is essential that we remain vigilant and keep ethical AI top of mind.

value.title: The Pope Just Released a Guide to Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: The Pope has released a guidebook on AI ethics. Yes, you heard that right. The supreme pontiff has partnered with Santa Clara University's Markkula Center for Applied Ethics to form the Institute ...

value.title: Human oversight key to keeping AI honest
value.excerpt: Tools powered by artificial intelligence should not be left on their own to decide what content people should read, says the head of trust at news aggregator platform SmartNews, who explains why humans must always be kept in the loop.

value.title: How weaponizing AI could alter the outcomes of elections
value.excerpt: Mike Hamilton, co-founder of cybersecurity firm Critical Insight, says there are currently no guardrails against AI’s power to surgically target voters for disinformation. He hopes that it could also be applied to detecting fraud.

value.title: The Vatican Has A Plan To Help Keep AI In Control

value.title: How generative AI is already changing the workplace: Oracle just added it to HR software
value.excerpt: Generative AI-powered features will improve the job posting, search, and hiring processes for HR pros​ and job applicants alike, the company says.

value.title: AI arms race: This global index ranks which nations dominate AI development
value.excerpt: Although the past few months have seen a surge in AI developments, the global AI arms race has been underway for years. Since 2020, Tortoise Media has produced its annual Global AI Index, which ranks the nations competing for AI dominance -- and the latest rankings are in.
